overview: An outcall service madam and her boyfriend - who owns an auto repair shop - decide to pool their business interests and create a new business that caters to consumer's automotive and erotic needs. 'The Body Shop' proves to be a winning combination as eager customers line up to get their thrown rods and clogged valves fixed in record time. The duo, however, are not the best bosses to work for and their employees set them up for a bust.
tagline: Body Shop... for the ultimate lube job
title: Body Shop
